DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and the efficacy of occipital nerve stimulation treating Chronic Migraine Headache
DOC.brief_title: An Italian Randomized Open-label Study of Occipital Nerve Stimulation in the Treatment of Chronic Migraine Headache
DOC.criteria: patients with migraine patients 18 years aged or above patients which participated within the last 30 days or plan to participate during this study in another device or drug trial patients pregnant or planning on becoming pregnant during the study period
